title: Ticket #3581: Negotiator Match Log Test
description:
Negotiator MatchLog Test

negotiator_match_log_exists.run

If one configures a NEGOTIATOR_MATCH_LOG=somename, then that file should live in the confor log location but ONLY have MATCH information and not be a duplicate of the NegotiatorLog.

The test sets up a personal condor with these two lines added: 

  DAEMON_LIST = MASTER,SCHEDD,COLLECTOR,NEGOTIATOR,STARTD
  NEGOTIATOR_MATCH_LOG = MatchLog

The test first runs a simple job to create entries in the MatchLog.

I added another function in Check/CondorLog.pm. The run check there was tied to getting the log name based on a daemon(RunCheck). This is not the case here so this one is passed the name of a file in the log location, a regular expression and optionally an "allmatch" term.

The basic call looks for one or more matches to the regular expression while the second looks for nothing which does not match the regular expression(is only match records).

In both tests our regular exprerssion is just the word "Match"
check_ins:

2013-Apr-29 08:14   Check-in [35591]: Create a new test for the separate match log one can ask the negotiator to create #3581 (By Bill Taylor )
